CREATE TABLE credit_authority ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, country VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, report_source VARCHAR(20), report_name VARCHAR(60), client_pin VARCHAR(50), loan_application_id BIGINT, fetch_time TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT(current_timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC'), report_context JSONB );
CREATE INDEX credit_authority_pin ON credit_authority (client_pin);
